attributes.action: immediately change the law to ensure that individuals in Zimbabwe who supported and carried out atrocities in the name of Robert Mugabe and who will, one day, need to leave Zimbabwe (even if it is not until Mugabe dies a natural death) are NOT allowed entry into this country - EVER!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We cannot, again, allow the ludicrous situation whereby, for example, war criminals from the Bosnian conflict, came to this country and are using the Human Rights Act to prevent us from sending them back to their own country for trial.  Robert Mugabe and his henchmen must know that the UK is 'No Hiding Place' for them.
